level.heading: RENTAL HOUSING CASES – OFFICIAL RECORD OF A PROCEEDING (ยง 1-2939)

level.text: 2939.1 The official record of a proceeding shall consist of the following:
The final order and any other orders or notices of the Administrative Law Judge;
The recordings or any transcripts of the proceedings before the Administrative Law Judge;
All papers and exhibits offered into evidence at the hearing; and
All papers filed by the parties or the Rent Administrator at OAH.
Documents attached to a petition or other filings must be offered and received in evidence at a hearing before the Administrative Law Judge can use them to establish facts.
